duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordinate with business units leads and subject matter experts to track and drive progress in all aspects of the Better Future Blueprint.
Lead ESG Reporting on Enterprise Level demonstrating performance on Better Future Blueprint.
Collate ESG data on enterprise level in collaboration with BU Leads.
Engage with peers, think tanks, industry groups and associations to expand HAVI’s network and affiliations, as aligned to strategy.
Lead publication of Better Future Blueprint report, and support targeted and customer-specific reports as needed.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in business, sustainability, supply chain management or other relevant discipline; 4-7 years’ cumulative experience in corporate social responsibility, sustainability and related disciplines.
